In England, in the seven days to 16 May, there were 11,526 new confirmed cases (20.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 May, there were 12,136 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 5% (610 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 May is 3,892,258 (6,915 cases per 100,000 population).
